(Simplified: 枥)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 歷 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 歷 [ lì ] history; calendar
①馬槽：“老驥伏櫪，志在千里”。
②古同“櫟”，木名。

櫪字的基本解释

櫪
lì
见“枥”。

櫪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》郎擊切，入錫，來。］
“枥1”的繁体字。
(1)同“櫟”。树名。麻栎。
(2)马槽。亦指关牲畜的地方。
(3)见“櫪”。

櫪字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫪； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页561第16
【唐韻】郞擊切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】郞狄切，?音歷。【說文】櫪㯕，椑指也。【徐鍇曰】以木椑十指而縛之。【廣韻】櫪，馬櫪也。【晉·桓溫風魏武詩】老驥伏櫪，志在千里。亦作歷。【前漢·梅福傳】伏歷千駟。　又木名。【張衡·南都賦】楓柙櫨櫪。【李善註】與櫟同。又【韻會】引《韓愈·山石》詩時見松櫪皆十圍。　又【正韻】蠶薄曰櫪。

stable
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guangyun" Lang hits and cuts, enters the tin, come. ]
Traditional characters for "枥1".
(1) Same as "Quercus". Tree name. Sawtooth oak.
(2) The manger. Also refers to the place where livestock is closed.
(3) See "枥".
stable
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　枥; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 561 16
[Tang Yun] Tan hit cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Tan Di cut,? Sound calendar. [Said the text] Fuwa, Fuzhi also. [Xu Kai said] Bind it with ten fingers. 【Guang Yun】Ting, Ma Ting also. 【Jin·Huan Wenfeng Weiwu Poems】The old Ji Fufu, ambition is a thousand miles. Also make history. [Previous Han · Mei Fu Biography] A thousand years in the past.　Also wooden name. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】Feng Chu Chu Chu. [Li Shan's Note] Same as Qu. Also [Yunhui] When quoting the poem "Han Yu·Shanshi", I saw that Songtou was surrounded by ten.　[Zheng Yun] The silkworm said thinly and said Tori.
